output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral content.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu, candidatul nostru la Președinția României" and promotes his project for Romania.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with a significant reach (125,000-150,000 impressions) and targets the general population of Baia Mare and Maramureș.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post has multiple electoral objectives: - Promotes parliamentary candidates for PSD - Promotes Marcel Ciolacu as presidential candidate - Presents his presidential project - Encourages people to vote
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content. It's a first-person narrative from a party representative promoting their candidates and platform.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with electoral purposes, evidenced by the CMF number and party byline.
The post mixes parliamentary election campaign (which is still allowed) with presidential election campaign (which is not allowed after the propaganda period ended).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Presents electoral promises and platform - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Explicitly promotes voting considerations - Combines parliamentary and presidential campaign messages
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Maramureș, prin intermediul paginii "Dancus Ioan Doru", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru candidatul la președinție Marcel Ciolacu după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, într-o postare sponsorizată cu ID 1307053713792365. Postarea prezintă explicit "proiectul pentru România propus de Marcel Ciolacu, candidatul nostru la Președinția României" și descrie programul său electoral, având efect de influențare a votului pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea conține număr CMF (11240017) și este distribuită după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, având un impact semnificativ prin atingerea unui public de peste 125.000 de persoane prin plată pe platformele Facebook și Instagram.
